name: This is a Cry for Help
summary:
Edmund McMillen compilation CD, with comics, games, prototypes, betas, unreleased, rarities, animations, commentaries, and more.

CD contents:

Games:
Blast Miner! (Demo)
Blast Miner! Arcade (Discontinued)
Blood Car 2000! Deluxe!
Gish (Demo)
Gish: The Lost Levels (Unreleased)
Guppy Prototype (Unreleased)
Cereus Peashy
Tri-achnid
Carious Weltling
Carious Weltling 2
Twin Hobo Rocket
The C Word
Clubby the Seal
Viviparous Dumpling
Aether
Meat Boy
Host
Coil

Bonus Games:
Gish Beta IGF04 (Unreleased)
Cereus Peashy (Beta) (Unreleased Tom Fulp Build)
Tri-achnid Beta (Unreleased)
Weltling Dressup
Clubby Killing Season (Caulder Build)
Snack-o-Lantern
Vertigo (Meat Boy Prototype)
Meat Boy GB (Unreleased)

-Extras
Commentary on all games
Concept art
Early in game graphics
Magazine Articles
Box art
and unreleased bonus content
